scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch --sign -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major --sign -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
